Harry Styles Bocorkan Judul dan Tanggal Rilis Album Kedua
05 Nov 2019, 13:45 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Album solo kedua ini bahkan membuat Harry Styles terpaksa menolak tawaran peran di film live-action 'The Little Mermaid'. (AFP PHOTO / ANGELA WEISS)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Harry Styles membagikan detail terkait album solo kedua pada Selasa (5/11). Lewat unggahan di akun media sosial, personel One Direction ini mengatakan bahwa album tersebut ia beri judul 'Fine Line' dan akan dirilis pada 13 Desember mendatang.Album ini akan menjadi tindak lanjut album debut Styles dengan konsep penamaan diri sendiri, 'Harry Styles' pada 2017."FINE LINE. THE ALBUM. DEC 13," tulis Styles pada keterangan unggahan foto yang diduga akan menjadi sampul album tersebut



Sebelum merilis album penuh, Styles telah lebih dulu meluncurkan lagu pembuka yang berjudul 'Lights Up'. Dalam video, Styles yang bertelanjang dada terlihat berada di tengah kerumunan orang yang menari di sekitarnya. Dalam adegan lain, ia tampak sendirian di rumah serta duduk menghadap belakang di atas sepeda motor.



Styles sempat mendiskusikan proses rekaman untuk album mendatang dengan Rolling Stone. Dia berbicara tentang pengaruh rock klasik serta nuansa psychedelics sebagai materi terbaru.


Artwork yang diduga akan menjadi sampul album solo kedua Harry Styles. (dok.Columbia Records)

"Ini semua tentang berhubungan seks dan merasa sedih," kata pria berusia 25 tahun itu, September lalu.Belum lama berselang, ia turut mengungkap bahwa ia hendak menjalani tur konser pada 2020. Hal itu menjadi salah satu alasan menolak peran sebagai Prince Eric dalam film 'The Little Mermaid' versi live-action."Saya rasa itu jelas akan menjadi film yang luar biasa. Tapi mereka syuting terlalu lama dan saya ingin tur tahun depan, mungkin," kata Styles dalam wawancara dengan Capital FM. (agn/rea)

Harry Styles Leaks Second Album Title and Release Date
05 Nov 2019, 13:45 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


This second solo album even made Harry Styles forced to turn down offers of roles in the live-action film 'The Little Mermaid'. (AFP PHOTO / ANGELA WEISS)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Harry Styles shared details related to the second solo album on Tuesday (11/5). Through uploads on social media accounts, One Direction personnel said that the album he gave the title 'Fine Line' and will be released on December 13. This album will be a follow-up to the debut album Styles with the concept of self-naming, 'Harry Styles' on 2017. "FINE LINE. THE ALBUM. DEC 13," Styles wrote in the description of the photo upload that was supposed to be the cover of the album



Before releasing the full album, Styles had already launched the opening song entitled 'Lights Up'. In the video, a shirtless Styles is seen in the middle of a crowd dancing around him. In another scene, he looks alone at home and sits facing back on a motorcycle.



Styles briefly discussed the recording process for the upcoming album with Rolling Stone. He talked about the influence of classical rock and the nuances of psychedelics as the latest material.


Artwork is thought to be the cover of Harry Styles' second solo album. (doc.Columbia Records)

"It's all about having sex and feeling sad," the 25-year-old said last September. Not long ago, he also revealed that he wanted to go on a concert tour in 2020. That was one of the reasons for rejecting the role of Prince Eric in the film "The Little Mermaid" live-action version. "I think it will definitely be an extraordinary film. But they are shooting too long and I want to tour next year, maybe," Styles said in an interview with Capital FM. (agn / rea)
